Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition: chat room n : a site on the internet where a number of users can communicate in real time (typically one dedicated to a particular topic) [syn: {chatroom}]
chatroom n : a site on the internet where a number of users can communicate in real time (typically one dedicated to a particular topic) [syn: {chat room}]
